channel.title: Rupertland Legislation Updates
channel.description: New laws, regulations, and legislative updates from the Rupertland Parliament

item.title: Digital Rights Protection Act 2025
item.description: New legislation strengthens data protection rights and establishes digital privacy standards for all citizens and businesses operating in Rupertland.

item.title: Small Business Support Regulations
item.description: Updated regulations provide streamlined registration process and tax incentives for small businesses with fewer than 10 employees.

item.title: Environmental Protection Amendment
item.description: Amendment to the Environmental Protection Act introduces stricter emissions standards and enhanced penalties for environmental violations.
